name: mad spirits
description:
Game made for mini-jam 14, theme "Elements", limitation "no humans".

Link to jam - https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-14-elements-

Elemental spirits are mad. They want to kill you until your dead !

 +Fire spirits are vulnerable to water shots.

+Water spirits are vulnerable to fire shots.

 +Earth spirits are vulnerable to wind shots.

 +Wind  spirits are vulnerable to earth shots.

Tips

 +You can change yourself into one of those elements, by touching correct element-tiles.

+ Elemental spirits different than  you hurts you, elemental spirits same as you heals you.

Exemple, if you touch water tile , you get water powers, and then:

+ you can shot fire spirits.

+  you are vulnerable to fire, earth and wind.

+ you are healed by other water spirits.

Controls :

 +Arrow keys to move.

 +WASD to shoot.
